snippet: A man who killed four people in a shooting spree carried a large weapons cache, indicating he might have planned a much larger attack than he was able to carry out.
abstract: Police say the gunman who killed four people in shooting spree in Santa Monica, Calif, before he was killed by police at Santa Monica College, carried vast arsenal with him; size of arsenal indicates he might have planned much larger attack.
lead_paragraph: A man who killed four people in a shooting spree carried a large weapons cache, indicating he might have planned a much larger attack than he was able to carry out.

headline.main: Police Call Santa Monica Gunman ‘Ready for Battle’
headline.print_headline: Police Call Santa Monica Gunman ‘Ready for Battle’
